name: legible

/ˈledʒ·ə·bli/
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe writing or text that you can read because the letters are clear, the text is printed well, etc.: Her handwriting was barely legible. Compare
illegible legibly adverb
The names of the partners must be shown legibly on all business letters.
